title: Release Candidate of iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, Available for Testing
description: Apple has issued the Release Candidate builds of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4. Release Candidate (RC) builds are typically the last version of a beta cycle before the software gets issued to the general public, indicating that final versions of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4 are coming soon, possibly ... Read More
author: Jamie Cuevas
excerpt: Apple has issued the Release Candidate builds of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4. Release Candidate (RC) builds are typically the last version of a beta cycle before the software gets…
text: Apple has issued the Release Candidate builds of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4. Release Candidate (RC) builds are typically the last version of a beta cycle before the software gets issued to the general public, indicating that final versions of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4 are coming soon, possibly by the end of this week or next. There are a few new features that are expected to arrive in iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4, including bringing the polarizing AI Mail Categories feature on iPhone over to the Mac and iPad, refinements to Apple Intelligence including a Priority Notifications feature, the ability to generate ambient music from Control Center, and the inclusion of various new Emoji icons. If you’re beta testing system software on Apple Watch, Apple TV, and Apple Vision Pro, you’ll also find RC builds available for those devices. How to Install MacOS Sequoia 15.4 RC A Mac that is actively enrolled in the beta testing programs for MacOS can find the RC build by doing the following: Go to the  Apple menu and select “System Settings” Select “General” and then choose “Software Update” Choose to “Update Now” for MacOS Sequoia 15.4 The Mac must restart to finish installation. How to Install iOS 18.4 / iPadOS 18.4 RC If your iOS/iPadOS devices is enrolled in the beta testing programs, getting RC build is easy: Open the “Settings” app on your device Go to “General”, and then select “Software Update” Select to “Download and Install” the iOS 18.4 / iPadOS 18.4 update iPhone or iPad must restart to complete installation. When will iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4 be released as final? Since this is the RC (Release Candidate) build, it’s likely the final version of iOS 18.4, macOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4 will be released in the near future, possibly as soon as the end of this week or next week. RC builds usually match the final version of beta system software that is released to the general public, absent any major bugs or security issues that are found. Therefore, with the release of the RC builds, it is reasonable to expect the launch of iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4 to be near.
html:
Apple has issued the Release Candidate builds of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4.

Release Candidate (RC) builds are typically the last version of a beta cycle before the software gets issued to the general public, indicating that final versions of iOS 18.4, MacOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4 are coming soon, possibly by the end of this week or next.

There are a few new features that are expected to arrive in iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4, including bringing the polarizing AI Mail Categories feature on iPhone over to the Mac and iPad, refinements to Apple Intelligence including a Priority Notifications feature, the ability to generate ambient music from Control Center, and the inclusion of various new Emoji icons.

If you’re beta testing system software on Apple Watch, Apple TV, and Apple Vision Pro, you’ll also find RC builds available for those devices.

How to Install MacOS Sequoia 15.4 RC

A Mac that is actively enrolled in the beta testing programs for MacOS can find the RC build by doing the following:

  1. Go to the  Apple menu and select “System Settings”
  2. Select “General” and then choose “Software Update”
  3. Choose to “Update Now” for MacOS Sequoia 15.4

The Mac must restart to finish installation.

How to Install iOS 18.4 / iPadOS 18.4 RC

If your iOS/iPadOS devices is enrolled in the beta testing programs, getting RC build is easy:

  1. Open the “Settings” app on your device
  2. Go to “General”, and then select “Software Update”
  3. Select to “Download and Install” the iOS 18.4 / iPadOS 18.4 update

iPhone or iPad must restart to complete installation.

When will iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4 be released as final?

Since this is the RC (Release Candidate) build, it’s likely the final version of iOS 18.4, macOS Sequoia 15.4, and iPadOS 18.4 will be released in the near future, possibly as soon as the end of this week or next week.

RC builds usually match the final version of beta system software that is released to the general public, absent any major bugs or security issues that are found.

Therefore, with the release of the RC builds, it is reasonable to expect the launch of iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and MacOS Sequoia 15.4 to be near.
